Interface AccumuloClient.ConnectionOptions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AccumuloClient.AccumuloClientFactory, AccumuloClient.ClientInfoFactory
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccumuloClient.FromOptions
    Enclosing interface:
    AccumuloClient

    public static interface AccumuloClient.ConnectionOptions
extends AccumuloClient.AccumuloClientFactory
    Build methods for connection options
